::?1::
"I should trust because?"

::Lilly::
Finishes her device looks at void still struggling with Tertran 1 and 1/2

::Void::
"It will do for a while but it need the data."

::Lilly::
Starts a file transfer "That should hold I am a autobot after all.ï¿½ As she 
does a system scan.

::?3::
Finishes his Device "Are you sure this thing will work?"

::Lilly::
"In theory yes but we need to restore power to the main Thrusters we can't 
connect them to Tertran 1. We need Koj and the Fang."

::?2::
"In theory everything works. Why do we need Koj?"

::Lilly::
"The cores from the CF are not the same as the Autobot's the fang can do 
power transfer I hope draining the power cores and powering this battery 
thing you hooked to the thrusters."

::Inu::
Finishing the heat shielding.

::Ark repairs Drones::
Working Lilly devices spreading and attaching them to KEY point in the ship.

::Koj::
Gets a transmission from Lilly "Ok." Slides back opening the shields and 
closing behind him as he enters. Koj takes the Fang and splits it in half 
and thrust half in the stolen power cores and the other half in the engine 
battery and starts the transfer.
